allow: Bash(..backendvenvScriptspython.exe -c "from app.services.stock_crawler import StockCrawler; import datetime; df = StockCrawler.fetch_stock_data(''2330.TW'', ''2024-01-01'', ''2025-12-31''); print(f''Records: {len(df) if df is not None else 0}''); print(f''Latest date: {df[""date""].iloc[-1] if df is not None and len(df) > 0 else ""N/A""}'')")
